title.rendered: Air Seoul in Seoul, Republic of Korea

content.rendered:
Air Seoul is a South Korean low-cost carrier and a subsidiary of Asiana Airlines. The airline is based at Incheon International Airport in Seoul, from which it operates flights to international destinations. It launched operations on 11 July 2016.

The airline was established on 7 April 2015. In June 2016, Air Seoul operated trial flights within South Korea.

Air Seoul Contact Address, Phone, Opening hours and Website

Air Seoul Address : 176, Haneul-gil, Gangseo-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea

Phone number : 1800-8100 (+82-1800-8100 when used overseas)

Business hours: 09:00~18:00 daily

Air Seoul Official website : https://flyairseoul.com/CW/en/main.do

Fleet size: 06

  • Airbus A321-200

Air Seoul Baggage Allowance

View Air Seoul Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Traveling while Pregnant Women in Air Seoul

  • Pregnancy between 32 and 36 weeks you must submitted medical certificate within 7 days before air travel.
  • Pregnancy 36 weeks and above you must submitted medical certificate within 3 days before air travel.

For more details: https://flyairseoul.com/CW/en/pregnantWoman.do

Traveling with Pets

  • Pets are allowed in Air Seoul (dogs, cats, and birds) that are more than 8 weeks old as carry-on baggage.
  • Guide dogs for the visually impaired may be transported in the cabin free of charge.

For more details: https://flyairseoul.com/CW/en/animal.do

Queries handled by Air Seoul Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Seoul office in Republic of Korea Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Seoul office in Republic of Korea: (click on the stars below)
